name: duckdb-dashboard
description: Multi-platform data dashboard application with DuckDB

scripts.dev:web: concurrently "npm run backend:web" "cd web-frontend && npm run dev"
scripts.dev:desktop: cd desktop && npm run tauri dev
scripts.build:web: cd web-frontend && npm run build && cd ../backend && cargo build --release
scripts.build:desktop: cd desktop && npm run tauri build
scripts.test: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:backend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:backend
scripts.format: npm run format:frontend && npm run format:backend
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd web-frontend && npm install && cd ../desktop && npm install
